name: owlet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young owl (= a bird with a flat face and large eyes that hunts small animals at night): When the owls can't find food anymore, their owlets starve. We saw some newly hatched owlets.
mlorenzphotography/ Moment/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesAn owlet whistled in a tree.She tried raising owlets in her bedroom under a heat lamp.After fledging, the owlets spend three months with their parents.
